question: If there is any disagreement between the Senate and the House of Representatives in USA, it is resolved by which of the following authorities?
option4: Conference committee consisting of 3 to 9 members from each House
answer: Conference committee consisting of 3 to 9 members from each House
explanation: If there is any disagreement between the Senate and the House of Representatives in USA, it is resolved by Conference committee consisting of 3 to 9 members from each House.
